description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for an admin orders management screen, including a header and placeholder content for orders review, filtering, and actions.

classes.name: AdminOrdersManagementScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget representing the main screen for managing orders, with a header and placeholder for order-related content.

classes.name: _NeonSection
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget rendering a decorated section with a header, icon, and list of child widgets.

classes.name: _NeonPlaceholder
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget that displays a styled placeholder container with an icon and text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each widget, defining the UI layout for the admin orders management screen and its components.
